sentence: "This  time,  on  Oct.  8  —  the  day  after  Hamas-led  militants  attacked  Israel  from  Gaza,  killing  about  1,200  Israelis  and  foreigners  —  retaliatory  attacks  across  the  Lebanese  border  began  in  earnest.
In  the  Gaza  Strip,  Israel's  military  response  has  killed  11,470  Palestinians,  according  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry.
